content:
Wei Li is now a Ph.D. student in FLARE LAB at School of Information Science and Technology (SIST) of ShanghaiTech University. Wei received his B.S. degree in computer science from Northwestern Polytechnical University, Shaanxi, China in 2015.
He is interested in making virtual worlds with computer, and more specifically in the area of computer graphics, physically-based animation, computational physics, scientific computing, rendering, and artificial intelligence.

title: Wei Li
